Name: Boss Loot Key
Description:
Participating in defeating a boss monster in the wildness will drop a boss loot chest. This item is required to open it. Wheter you have a key or not, participating in defeating the boss grants additional loot rewards. Team participation is recommended. In addition to chests, boss monsters also drop EXP, season points, Luno, and have a chance to drop rare monster materials and gear.
Refreshes daily from 05:00 - 05:10(UTC-2). Grants: 2
When the quantity held exceeds 6, no more will be granted automatically.
